function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Panic buying behavior due to the pandemic","Impact":"Increased demand for essential items leading to shortages","Mitigation":"Implementing purchase limits, providing clear communication, and ensuring adequate supply","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, communication platforms, and supply chain analytics","People":"Consumers, retailers","Owner":"Retailers, government authorities"},{"Description":"Different consumer segments with varying responses to the pandemic","Impact":"Ineffective marketing strategies for irrational consumer segments","Mitigation":"Tailoring marketing strategies based on consumer segments, conducting exploratory data analysis to understand consumer behavior","Technologies":"Data analytics, consumer segmentation tools","People":"Marketing professionals, consumer behavior researchers","Owner":"Marketing agencies, research institutions"}]}
